name: Star Catchers
description:
I created my own "game jam" - Labor Day Game Jam 2020. I set the limitation to be whatever I could do in roughly 8 hours. I set the limitation to arcade-style (movement + 1 button, high score) and found the theme of "inseparable" to use.

From that came Star Catchers. Two star-crossed aliens trying to collect as many stars as possible while avoiding comets. They can't move too quickly, but they can use each other to cast a wider collection area, but that's also a wider area for comets to hit! Compete (locally ;) ) for the best high score!

controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys - movement

Space / Left click - Hold to expand, release to contract

Credits:

All done by me

Game Engine: Godot

Sound Effects: Bfxr

Music: Bosca Ceoil
